title: Betatype
content:
Betatype is a small foundry run by [Christian Robertson](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204222823/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Christian%20Robertson), of Walnut Creek, CA. Fonts published include [Dear Sarah](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204222823/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Dear%20Sarah), [Pill Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204222823/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Pill%20Gothic) and [Doublewide](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204222823/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Doublewide).

url: [betatype.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204222823/http:/betatype.com/)
author: test
